intro.description: Obvious we want to create models. The new model dialog allows you to define a new model and generate the code for it.

item.title: Create new model
item.description:
File,New,jACT-R Model, will open the new model dialog. Models are stored under the models/ folder in the respective project. If the IDE cannot infer the project, you will have to select it from the list.
In addition to specifying the model name and initial modules to install, you can specify the syntax to use with the model's file name extension.
.lisp will generate lisp.
.jactr will generate the xml format.
The jactr editor is more fully supported.
